title: Getting tired of being disconnected...
body:
while I'm in the THIRD game of my promos.  

I'M FUCKING TIRED OF IT.  THIS IS THE 8TH TIME IN A ROW THIS HAS HAPPENED.  IT JUST DISCONNECTS.  I NEVER HAVE THIS PROBLEM UNLESS IT IS RIGHT ON THE THIRD GAME OF MY PROMOTION.   NEVER HAVE IT ANY OTHER TIME BUT THAT ONE FUCKING TIME.  I PAY SO MUCH FOR INTERNET AND A GOOD COMPUTER JUST TO HAVE THE GAME RANDOMLY FUCKING DISCONNECT ME.  I'M FUCKING TIRED OF IT.  

FUCK YOU, RIOT.  I'M NEVER GOING TO SPEND A DIME ON THIS GAME.  EVER.  FUCKING RIGGED PIECES OF SHIT.  HIDDEN PAY TO WIN SYSTEM.

PLEASE GET FUCKED.

replies.body: Riot isn't sabotaging you. It's your ISP, or it's some problem at home. If you legit think Riot is doing this to its players purposely then you've got some fucked up idea of what lies in the realm of possibility.

A tad gullible aren't we?  They use the same method casinos use to keep people playing.  Bait them enough and they'll keep playing.  The longer they play the more likely they'll spend money.  Every other game online is pretty much like this if it's free.  There is some type of pay to win system.  Just popped in 5 bucks and got really poor opponents.  Instantly won my first promo.  Let's see if I put in 5 more what happens the 2nd time.
wow u just commented to the same guy 3 times for one reply (if u count replying to yourself replying to him an extra reply)
I KNOW SO ODD ISN'T IT?  HOW WHEN I PAY THE PROMOS ARE WON EASILY?  BUT WHEN I DON'T I HAVE TO STRUGGLE 8 TIMES JUST TO GET TO THEM?  HOW ODDDDD.
Well look at that.  I won my promos.  How strange.

After being disconnected in my 3rd promo game 8 times in a row, I throw in 10 bucks and I win no problem.

HOW ODD.
have you tried contacting your isp instead of auto assuming it's riots fault?

Yes.  It's not them.  It's even more tilting being thrown into AFK leaver status.  Waiting so long just to get to promos just to get thrown back into AFK leaver status.  Been happening for the past month.  Getting fucking tired of this.
